narrative:
This is the 1st prelicense inspection for a Class B Dealer license. 
 
The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
The licensing fee of $475 must be submitted to: 
USDA - APHIS - Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave 
Building B, 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO 80526 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Ave. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with this applicant.
